title: Trooper
description: The lowest rank in 3:16 and they can use Force Weakness.

orders.title: Order 1
orders.description: Kill as many lifeforms as you can

title: Corporal

orders.title: Order 1

orders.title: Order 2

title: Sergeant
description: A Non-Commissioned Officer in charge of a squad of Troopers.

orders.title: Order 1
orders.description: Kill as many lifeforms as you can

orders.title: Order 2
orders.description: Maximize the kill ratio (bugs killed per Trooper).

orders.title: Order 3
orders.description: Follow directives issued by the Officers.

orders.title: Order 4
orders.description: Protect your squad of Troopers (can use E-Vac).
